segments.text: Good morning , Family . We'll have our board meeting this afternoon . Can you write the agenda on the notice board ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What will you discuss at the meeting ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We'll talk about the financial report for the first half of the year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We'll also discuss the personnel plan for the second half of the year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Please write them down on the notice board . I want everybody to see them .
segments.speaker: S1
